headline: Essex Property Trust Prices $350 Million of Senior Notes
summary: SAN MATEO, Calif., December 03, 2025--Essex Property Trust, Inc. (NYSE:ESS) ("Essex") announced today that its operating partnership, Essex Portfolio, L.P. (the "Issuer"), priced an underwritten public offering of $350.0 million aggregate principal amount of 4.875% senior notes due 2036 (the "Notes"). The Notes were priced at 99.093% of par value with a yield to maturity of 4.988%. Interest is payable semiannually at an interest rate per annum of 4.875% on February 15 and August 15 of each year

headline: Is it Wise to Retain Essex Property Stock in Your Portfolio for Now?
summary: ESS leverages strong West Coast demand, tech-driven efficiencies and a solid balance sheet, but rising supply and debt pressures temper its momentum.
